name: computerization
content:

the process of starting to use a computer to do something that was done by people or other machines before: Computerization is slowly but surely taking hold of every aspect of business. Computerization of personal records might enable a potential employer to have access to private medical information. See
computerize
More examplesFewer examplesIncreasing centralization and computerization make it possible for Hospital Pharmacy Services to assist with patient management.The rapid computerization of car engines has forced many mechanics to choose early retirement.Computerization doesn't eliminate errors, but it is an extremely useful tool to help reduce them.
